Description: Range from which population was obtained (invasive UK or native US)
Original population code--created prior to selecting populations for use in thermal performance experiments. "I" indicates invasive UK, and "N" incidates native North America.

New population code--created after selecting populations for use in thermal performance experiments. "I" indicates invasive UK, and "N" incidates native North America. Numbers following "I" or "N" are based on latitude, where "1" indicates the lowest latitude.
Mean Diurnal Range (Mean of monthly (max temp - min temp))  (°C *10)
